#include <stdio.h>
 
int main ()
{
    char A[150][150], Input [150];
    long M, N, I, J, Case=0, Flag = 0;
    while (1){
 
        gets(Input);
        sscanf(Input,"%ld%ld",&M,&N);
 
        if (M==0 && N==0)
            break;
 
        long B[150][150] = {0};
 
        for (I=0; I<M; I++)
            gets (A[I]);
 
        for (I=0; I<M; I++ ) {
 
            for (J=0; J<N; J++){
 
                if (A[I][J]=='*'){
                    B[I][J+1]++;
                    B[I+1][J+1]++;
                    B[I+1][J]++;
                    B[I+1][J-1]++;
                    B[I][J-1]++;
                    B[I-1][J-1]++;
                    B[I-1][J]++;
                    B[I-1][J+1]++;
                }
            }
 
        }
 
        // output
        if (Flag==1)
            printf("\n");
        Flag = 1;
        printf("Field #%ld:\n", ++Case);
        for (I=0; I<M; I++){
            for (J=0; J<N; J++){
                if (A[I][J]=='*')
                    printf("%c", A[I][J]);
                else
                    printf("%ld", B[I][J]);
 
            }
            printf("\n");
        }
 
        //printf("\n");
    }
    return 0;
}
